paragraphs: Disguised as the vicecanon's deputy, I've successfully tricked a member of the Pact into taking the sacred relics from Bogmother's reliquaries. They'll have to send forces to stop the dreugh from attacking nearby towns, weakening their defenses elsewhere.
I've gotten rid of everyone but the fool I duped into taking the relics, but I have plans. It will be very useful to have another body once I tire of being Saervild.
This place smells like a rotting kagouti. When will they send me elsewhere?
